text: Mur-sur-Allier is a commune in the Puy-de-Dôme department in Auvergne in central France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Mezel (the seat) and Dallet.Arrêté préfectoral 26 October 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Puy-de-Dôme department ==References== Category:Communes of Puy-de-Dôme Category:States and territories established in 2019
title: Mur-sur-Allier
